name: react-portfolio
description: ## Description The purpose of this project was to create a place to share my work that also demonstrates my knowledge of the latest technologies. This was achieved by creating a dynamic single page application using Reactjs.

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run start" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i

author: Korey Collazo
